ui_label: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CFC11
description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of CFC11 is CFCl3.  The IUPAC name for CFC11 is trichloro-fluoro-methane.
cell_methods: Error: height: area: time: mean (with all samples weighted by the number of moles of air in the sample) not found in cell methods, please register
